version_description: Important bug fixes and improved support for purchasing cell phones with a carrier plan in the app.
Important bug fixes and improved support for purchasing cell phones with a carrier plan in the app.

New! Now you can compare products directly on the details page. While viewing a product that you are interested in, scroll down to the Compare section and we'll show you features and specifications of similar products automatically.

This latest update introduces Save for Later in your Cart. Easily move items from Cart to the Saved Items list for purchase at a later date. Check it out today!

New! Now compare up to 4 products directly from your search results or while browsing in product categories. Just tap Compare (located next to the Filter button) and get started today.

This release is really looking up!  We’ve moved the Cart icon to the top navigation bar, adding your Cart to more places all across the app, like product detail pages - making it easier than ever to shop and checkout wherever you are.

With this latest release, we've updated and improved our Scan feature. In addition to overall speed enhancements, you can now scan multiple products and compare them. Give it a try next time you visit one of our stores. Just click the QR code in Search to

With this latest release, we've updated and improved our Scan feature. In addition to overall speed enhancements, you can now scan multiple products and compare them. Give it a try next time you visit one of our stores. Just click the QR code in Search to
Headed to the store to pickup your order? We've added a barcode on the Home tab to make your experience faster. Just show your barcode at the pickup counter and get your products in a snap.
Headed to the store to pickup your order? We've added a barcode on the Home tab to make your experience faster. Just show your barcode at the pickup counter and get your products in a snap.
Starting with this release, we're refreshing the user experience. You'll find the same great products, but with a whole new look and feel. Expect even more improvements in our upcoming releases.
